languages.text: "Вздумали судить меня?" {n}Ризза выхватывает амулет с клыкастой мордой и венцом рогов. Она нехорошо ухмыляется, глядя на вас.{/n} "Не стоило этого делать, ведь у меня есть козырь на крайний случай. Я, Ризза, не признаю ваше проклятое правосудие и вашего проклятого Императора! Я заключаю сделку, что была предложена, и отдаюсь во власть Предела рассвета! Умри, {name} фон Валанциус!" {n}Клыкастая морда распахивает пасть и, взревев, испускает в вас пламенную стрелу.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Вздумали судить меня?" {n}Ризза выхватывает амулет с клыкастой мордой и венцом рогов. Она нехорошо ухмыляется, глядя на вас.{/n} "Не стоило этого делать, ведь у меня есть козырь на крайний случай. Я, Ризза, не признаю ваше проклятое правосудие и вашего проклятого Императора! Я заключаю сделку, что была предложена, и отдаюсь во власть Предела Рассвета! Умри, {name} фон Валанциус!" {n}Клыкастая морда распахивает пасть и, взревев, испускает в вас пламенную стрелу.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: "You think you can judge me?" {n}Ryzza whips out an amulet with a beast's fanged head crowned by horns. She looks at you, grinning ominously.{/n} "You shouldn't have done that. I have something up my sleeve, in case the worst came to the worst. I, Ryzza, reject your accursed justice and your accursed Emperor! I accept the deal that was offered me, and surrender myself to the Edge of Daybreak! Die, {name} von Valancius!" {n}The fanged head opens its mouth, roars, and spits a flaming arrow at you.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Вздумали судить меня?" {n}Ризза выхватывает амулет с клыкастой мордой и венцом рогов. Я заключаю сделку, что была предложена, и отдаюсь во власть Предела рассвета! Умри, {name} фон Валанциус!" {n}Клыкастая морда распахивает пасть и, взревев, испускает в вас пламенную стрелу.{/n}

languages.text: “你以为你有权审判我吗？”{n}莱萨拿出一枚护身符，上面刻着一个长着犄角与獠牙的兽头。她看着你，脸上露出了不祥的笑容。{/n}“你们真不该这么做。这是我最后的底牌，但到了生死关头，我也只能用了。我，莱萨，我鄙夷你们该死的正义与该死的帝皇！我愿意接受你们开出来的条件，我愿意侍奉破晓锋刃！死吧，{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯！”{n}兽头张开了嘴，咆哮起来，朝你吐出了一支熊熊燃烧的利箭。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You think you can judge me?" {n}Ryzza whips out an amulet with a beast's fanged head crowned by horns. She looks at you, grinning ominously.{/n} "You shouldn't have done that. I have something up my sleeve, in case the worst came to the worst. I, Ryzza, reject your accursed justice and your accursed Emperor! I accept the deal that was offered me, and surrender myself to the Edge of Daybreak! Die, {name} von Valancius!" {n}The fanged head opens its mouth, roars, and spits a flaming arrow at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你以为你有权审判我吗？”{n}莱萨拿出一枚护身符，上面刻着一个长着犄角与獠牙的兽头。她看着你，脸上露出了不祥的笑容。{/n}“你们可真不该这么做。我还有最后的底牌，但到了生死关头，也只能用了。我，莱萨，我鄙夷你们该死的正义与该死的帝皇！我愿意接受你们开出来的条件，我愿意侍奉破晓锋刃！死吧，{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯！”{n}兽头张开了嘴，咆哮起来，朝你吐出了一支熊熊燃烧的利箭。{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: 「お前は私を裁ける立場か？」{n}リザは牙の生えた獣の頭のお守りを素早く手に取ると、不吉な笑みを浮かべた。{/n}「お前はやるべきではなかった。もしもの時を思って袖に隠しているものがある。私、リザは、お前の呪われた正義と呪われた皇帝を拒否する！提示された取引を受け入れ、暁の刃に身を委ねる！死ね、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス！」{n}怪物のお守りは口を開き、あなたに向かって燃える矢を吐き出した。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You think you can judge me?" {n}Ryzza whips out an amulet with a beast's fanged head crowned by horns. She looks at you, grinning ominously.{/n} "You shouldn't have done that. I have something up my sleeve, in case the worst came to the worst. I, Ryzza, reject your accursed justice and your accursed Emperor! I accept the deal that was offered me, and surrender myself to the Edge of Daybreak! Die, {name} von Valancius!" {n}The fanged head opens its mouth, roars, and spits a flaming arrow at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「お前は私を裁ける立場か？」{n}リザは牙の生えた獣の頭のお守りを素早く手に取ると、不吉な笑みを浮かべた。{/n}「お前はやるべきではなかった。もしもの時を思って袖に隠しているものがある。私、リザは、お前の呪われた正義と呪われた皇帝を拒否する！提示された取引を受け入れ、暁の刃に身を委ねる！死ね、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス！」{n}怪物のお守りは口を開き、あなたに向かって燃える矢を吐き出した。{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: «¿Cree que puede juzgarme?». {n}Ryzza saca un amuleto con la cabeza de una bestia con colmillos coronada por cuernos. Te mira, sonriendo de forma siniestra.{/n} «No debería haber hecho eso. Siempre me reservo algo por si las cosas van mal. ¡Yo, Ryzza, rechazo su maldita justicia y a su maldito Emperador! ¡Acepto el trato que se me ofreció y me entrego al Filo del Amanecer! ¡Muere, {name} von Valancius!». {n}La cabeza abre la boca, ruge y escupe una flecha con fuego hacia ti.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You think you can judge me?" {n}Ryzza whips out an amulet with a beast's fanged head crowned by horns. She looks at you, grinning ominously.{/n} "You shouldn't have done that. I have something up my sleeve, in case the worst came to the worst. I, Ryzza, reject your accursed justice and your accursed Emperor! I accept the deal that was offered me, and surrender myself to the Edge of Daybreak! Die, {name} von Valancius!" {n}The fanged head opens its mouth, roars, and spits a flaming arrow at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿Cree que puede juzgarme?». {n}Ryzza saca un amuleto con la cabeza de una bestia con colmillos coronada por cuernos. Te mira, sonriendo de forma siniestra.{/n} «No debería haber hecho eso. Siempre me reservo algo por si las cosas van mal. ¡Yo, Ryzza, rechazo su maldita justicia y a su maldito Emperador! ¡Acepto el trato que se me ofreció y me entrego al Filo del Amanecer! ¡Muere, {name} von Valancius!». {n}La cabeza abre la boca, ruge y escupe una flecha con fuego hacia ti.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: "Ihr glaubt, Ihr könnt über mich urteilen?" {n}Ryzza zieht blitzschnell ein Amulett heraus. Es ist ein Tierkopf mit scharfen Zähnen und spitzen Hörnern. Sie blickt dich mit einem bedrohlichen Grinsen an.{/n} "Das hättet Ihr nicht tun sollen. Ich habe etwas im Ärmel, für den Fall, dass es hart auf hart kommt. Ich, Ryzza, lehne Eure verfluchte Gerechtigkeit und Euren verfluchten Imperator ab! Ich akzeptiere den Handel, der mir angeboten wurde, und ergebe mich dem Rand des Tagesanbruchs! Sterbt, {name} von Valancius!" {n}Der Kopf mit den vielen Zähnen reißt den Mund auf, brüllt und speit einen flammenden Pfeil auf dich.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You think you can judge me?" {n}Ryzza whips out an amulet with a beast's fanged head crowned by horns. She looks at you, grinning ominously.{/n} "You shouldn't have done that. I have something up my sleeve, in case the worst came to the worst. I, Ryzza, reject your accursed justice and your accursed Emperor! I accept the deal that was offered me, and surrender myself to the Edge of Daybreak! Die, {name} von Valancius!" {n}The fanged head opens its mouth, roars, and spits a flaming arrow at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ihr glaubt, Ihr könnt über mich urteilen?" {n}Ryzza zieht blitzschnell ein Amulett heraus. Es ist ein Tierkopf mit scharfen Zähnen und spitzen Hörnern. Sie blickt dich mit einem bedrohlichen Grinsen an.{/n} "Das hättet Ihr nicht tun sollen. Ich habe etwas im Ärmel, für den Fall, dass es hart auf hart kommt. Ich, Ryzza, lehne Eure verfluchte Gerechtigkeit und Euren verfluchten Imperator ab! Ich akzeptiere den Handel, der mir angeboten wurde, und ergebe mich dem Rand des Tagesanbruchs! Sterbt, {name} von Valancius!" {n}Der Kopf mit den vielen Zähnen reißt den Mund auf, brüllt und speit einen flammenden Pfeil auf dich.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: « Vous vous croyez en droit de me juger ? » {n}Avec un sourire menaçant, Ryzza sort une amulette représentant la tête d'une bête à crocs couronnée d'épines.{/n} « Vous n'auriez pas dû faire ça. J'avais encore une carte dans ma manche, au cas où la situation tournerait mal. Moi, Ryzza, je renie votre prétendue justice et votre Empereur maudit ! J'accepte la proposition qui m'a été faite en m'offrant à la Lame de l'Aube ! Vous allez mourir, {name} von Valancius ! » {n}La tête de l'amulette ouvre la gueule, rugit et crache un jet de flammes sur vous.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You think you can judge me?" {n}Ryzza whips out an amulet with a beast's fanged head crowned by horns. She looks at you, grinning ominously.{/n} "You shouldn't have done that. I have something up my sleeve, in case the worst came to the worst. I, Ryzza, reject your accursed justice and your accursed Emperor! I accept the deal that was offered me, and surrender myself to the Edge of Daybreak! Die, {name} von Valancius!" {n}The fanged head opens its mouth, roars, and spits a flaming arrow at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Vous vous croyez en droit de me juger ? » {n}Avec un sourire menaçant, Ryzza sort une amulette représentant la tête d'une bête à crocs couronnée d'épines.{/n} « Vous n'auriez pas dû faire ça. J'avais encore une carte dans ma manche, au cas où la situation tournerait mal. Moi, Ryzza, je renie votre prétendue justice et votre Empereur maudit ! J'accepte la proposition qui m'a été faite en m'offrant à la Lame de l'Aube ! Vous allez mourir, {name} von Valancius ! » {n}La tête de l'amulette ouvre la gueule, rugit et crache un jet de flammes sur vous.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: "Beni yargılayabileceğinizi mi sanıyorsunuz?" {n}Sivri dişli ve boynuzlu bir hayvanın resmedildiği bir kolye çıkaran Ryzza, sana bakarak esrarlı bir edayla sırıtıyor.{/n} "Bunu yapmamalıydın. Yumurta kapıya dayandığında kullanmak üzere sakladığım bir silahım daha var. Ben Ryzza, sizin lanet adaletinizi de lanet İmparator'unuzu da reddediyorum! Bana teklif edilen anlaşmayı kabul ediyorum ve kendimi Tan Vakti'ne teslim ediyorum! Geber {name} von Valancius!" {n}Hayvan başı ağzını açıyor, kükrüyor ve yanan bir oku sana doğru fırlatıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You think you can judge me?" {n}Ryzza whips out an amulet with a beast's fanged head crowned by horns. She looks at you, grinning ominously.{/n} "You shouldn't have done that. I have something up my sleeve, in case the worst came to the worst. I, Ryzza, reject your accursed justice and your accursed Emperor! I accept the deal that was offered me, and surrender myself to the Edge of Daybreak! Die, {name} von Valancius!" {n}The fanged head opens its mouth, roars, and spits a flaming arrow at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Beni yargılayabileceğinizi mi düşünüyorsunuz?" {n}Ryzza, sivri dişli ve boynuzlu bir hayvanın resmedildiği bir kolye çıkarıyor, sana bakarak esrarlı bir edayla sırıtıyor.{/n} "Bunu yapmamalıydın. Yumurta kapıya dayandığında kullanmak üzere sakladığım bir silahım daha var. Ben, Ryzza, sizin lanetli adaletinizi de, lanetli İmparator'unuzu da reddediyorum! Bana teklif edilen anlaşmayı kabul ediyorum ve kendimi Tan Vakti'ne teslim ediyorum! Geber {name} von Valancius!" {n}Hayvan başı ağzını açıyor, kükrüyor ve sana yanan bir ok tükürüyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4
